title: tanks with damage
body: why do poppy,ekko rumble tank so much and do more damage than other champion very unfair, always get away with littlle health

replies.body: You're basically saying why are toplaners and the fighter-tank class so good at fighting up close. It's cause it's their job. It's the bruiser role at toplane. Tanky and able to fight and winlane. If you're bringing say zilean toplane expect to get dicked on. Facts of life.
